## Bibtex Reference Managers

1. [Mendeley](https://www.mendeley.com/download-desktop-new/)

A Mendeley account is required. You can sign up in Mendeley Desktop or at www.mendeley.com.  Uses a Chrome extension for web capture and syncs through the mendeley account.

2. Jabref

3. [Zotero](https://www.zotero.org/download/)

  - Desktop app
  - and Chrome Connector
  - https://retorque.re/zotero-better-bibtex/installation/
  - [Ubunto Launcher Installation](https://www.zotero.org/support/installation)
